document.masterDocTitle: Review of the Genus Dendrocellus Schmidt-Göbel (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Dryptini), with Descriptions of Seven New Species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the Genus Dendrocellus Schmidt-Göbel (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Dryptini), with Descriptions of Seven New Species

heading.emphasis:
Key to the species of the genus
Dendrocellus Schmidt-Göbel

paragraph.keyLead: 1 Pronotum red or brown, with purple luster ( Figs. 1 , 15 )............... 2
1 9 Pronotum black with green or blue metallic luster...................... 4

keyLead.keyStep:
2 (1) Claw with long pectinations in inner side ( Fig. 65 ). Angola , Cameroon , Congo , Kenya , Mozambique , South Africa , Senegal , Uganda , Zambia ....................................
D. australis Péringuey

subSubSection.paragraph:
2 9 Claw with very short pectinations in inner side ( Fig. 70 )............... 3
4 6
3(1 9 ) Elytra bicolored, basal two-thirds bluish-green, apical third dark purple to black, ( Fig. 109 ), striae faintly impressed, nearly effaced. Malawi .......................................
D. bicoloripennis
,
new species
